g.text: The compressional behaviour has been investigated carrying out a symmetry-preserving relaxa-
tion procedure by exploring, at selected values of volume (
is the volume of the original
optimized cell. Each model was then geometrically optimized. This approach has been successfully
The authors wish to thank the University of Bologna, Italy for funding the research.
